bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & seatstay, alloy chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, BB95, internal derailleur & dropper post routing, ISCG 05 mount, magnesium EVO link, Mino Link, 140mm travel

components.description: Fox Performance Series 34 Float w/CTD (climb-trail-descend) FIT damper, rebound, E2 tapered steerer, 15QR thru axle, 140mm travel
Fox Performance Series Float w/DRCV, CTD (climb-trail-descend) damper, rebound, tuned by Trek in California, 7.75x2.25"
Bontrager Rhythm Comp Tubeless Ready w/Stacked Lacing, 15mm front hub; 142x12 rear hub
Bontrager XR3 Team Issue Tubeless Ready, aramid bead, 27.5x2.35"
Shimano Deore XT, high direct mount
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise
FSA IS-2, E2, sealed cartridge bearing
